plot: After a long time of bad luck, the little criminal Tony and his gang successfully rob one of Brink's security transport, taking $30,000. Surprisingly their coup doesn't make the press. Curious Tony checks out their headquarters and finds out that their security standard is low beyond belief. Now a really big coup is prepared...   Written by  Tom Zoerner
title: El mayor robo del siglo

lists.title: The Best Heist Movies You Probably Haven’t Seen
